name: Ocean Current Shoulder Throw
type: Fish-Man/The Seven Warlords of the Sea/The Sun Pirates
effect: [Main] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: Play up to 1 {Fish-Man} type Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your hand. Then, return up to 1 Character with 6000 base power to the owner's hand. [Counter] Draw 1 card and your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
